Module org.elasticsearch.logging
Package org.elasticsearch.logging.spi

Interface LoggingBootstrapSupport

public interface LoggingBootstrapSupport
Used on startup and in testing infra. We can considere limiting the scope of export

  • Method Details

    • provider

      static LoggingBootstrapSupport provider()

    • registerErrorListener

      void registerErrorListener()
      Registers a listener for status logger errors. This listener should be registered as early as possible to ensure that no errors are logged by the status logger before logging is configured.

    • configureWithoutConfig

      void configureWithoutConfig(Optional<Level> defaultLogLevel, Map<String,Level> logLevelSettingsMap)
      Configure logging without reading a log4j2.properties file, effectively configuring the status logger and all loggers to the console.

      //* @param settings for configuring logger.level and individual loggers

    • configure

      void configure(String clusterName, String nodeName, Optional<Level> defaultLogLevel, Map<String,Level> logLevelSettingsMap, Path configFile, Path logsFile) throws IOException
      Configure logging reading from any log4j2.properties found in the config directory and its subdirectories from the specified environment. Will also configure logging to point the logs directory from the specified environment.

      //* @param environment the environment for reading configs and the logs path

      Throws:
      IOException - if there is an issue readings any log4j2.properties in the config directory xgthrows UserException if there are no log4j2.properties in the specified configs path

    • loadLog4jPlugins

      void loadLog4jPlugins()
      Load logging plugins so we can have node_name in the pattern.

    • setNodeName

      void setNodeName(String nodeName)
      Sets the node name. This is called before logging is configured if the node name is set in elasticsearch.yml. Otherwise it is called as soon as the node id is available.

    • init

      void init()

    • shutdown

      void shutdown()

    • consoleAppender

      Consumer<LoggingBootstrapSupport.ConsoleAppenderMode> consoleAppender()

    • checkErrorListener

      void checkErrorListener()
